import React from 'react' import useStyles from "./styles.js" import {Card,CardMedia} from "@material-ui/core" const Product = ({product}) => { console.log(product) const classes = useStyles(); console.log("Product") console.log(product) return ( <>

Name : {product.productName}

Price : {product.productPrice}

Quantity :{product.productQty}

Description : {product.productDescription}

Category :{product.productCategory?.category}

 ) } export default Product
